snippet: A fire at the Flight 93 National Memorial in Shanksville badly burned three administrative buildings Friday, a National Park Service spokesman said/
lead_paragraph: A fire at the Flight 93 National Memorial in Shanksville badly burned three administrative buildings Friday, a National Park Service spokesman said/

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Flight 93 Memorial Spared in Fire
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Flight 93 Memorial Spared In Fire
